again.name: Again
again.desc: A staff that allows allies to move again.

armorslayer.name: Armorslayer
armorslayer.desc: A sword effective against armored units.

armsscroll.name: Arms Scroll
armsscroll.desc: An item that increases a unit's weapon level for the currently equipped weapon or magic.

aum.name: Aum
aum.desc: A special staff for princesses that can revive a fallen ally.

aura.name: Aura
aura.desc: Light magic for women (Linde can use at level E).

bamboosword.name: Bamboo Sword
bamboosword.desc: A wooden practice sword. Weak, but easy to use.

barrier.name: Barrier
barrier.desc: Raises a nearby ally's resistance. Wears off with time.

reference.Other Effects: Grants +7 Resistance to ally (effect lowers each turn).

barstsaxe.name: Barst's Axe
barstsaxe.desc: A lumber axe owned by Barst of Talys.

bindingshield.name: Binding Shield
bindingshield.desc:
Grants +2 Strength, +2 Magic, +2 Skill, +2 Speed, +2 Luck, +2 Defense, +2 Resistance.
Raises all stats by 2 when held. It seals away the earth dragons within the dark altar.

blizzard.name: Blizzard
blizzard.desc: Potent magic used to attack with ice.

bolganone.name: Bolganone
bolganone.desc: Superior magic used to attack with flames.

bonddrop.name: Bond Drop
bonddrop.desc: A drop that can improve relationships with allies when used.

reference.Other Effects:
Unlocks all of a unit's supports.
Unlocks all of a unit's base conversations.
If used by Kris, only unlocks their conversations with Marth, Luke, Roderick, and Ryan and their first two conversations with Katarina.

bordcordaxe.name: Bordcord Axe
bordcordaxe.desc: A lumber axe owned by Bord and Cord of Talys.

braveaxe.name: Brave Axe
braveaxe.desc: An axe with which the wielder always strikes twice.

bravebow.name: Brave Bow
bravebow.desc: A bow with which the wielder always strikes twice.

bravelance.name: Brave Lance
bravelance.desc: A lance with which the wielder always strikes twice.

bravesword.name: Brave Sword
bravesword.desc: A sword with which the wielder always strikes twice.

bridgekey.name: Bridge Key
bridgekey.desc: A key used to lower a drawbridge.

bullionl.name: Bullion (L)
bullionl.desc: A large lump of gold that fetches 10,000G at a market.

bullions.name: Bullion (S)
bullions.desc: A lump of gold that fetches 5,000G at a market.

camusspike.name: Camus's Pike
camusspike.desc: A lance owned by Grust's Camus the Sable.

cecilssword.name: Cecil's Sword
cecilssword.desc: A sword owned by Cecil, an Altean knight.

chestkey.name: Chest Key
chestkey.desc: A key used to open chests.

clarissesbow.name: Clarisse's Bow
clarissesbow.desc: A bow owned by Clarisse of the Assassins.

cleavebow.name: Cleave Bow
cleavebow.desc: A bow effective against armored units.

cuttinggale.name: Cutting Gale
cuttinggale.desc: Magic that attacks with wind. Strong against fliers.

darksphere.name: Darksphere
darksphere.desc: Blocks all enemy attacks when held.

reference.Other Effects: Effect is negated if the enemy has the Lightsphere.

defense.name: Defense
defense.desc: A staff that raises an ally's Def by 2 for 1 turn.

defensebond.name: Defense Bond
defensebond.desc: Defense +2 for the whole chapter when used.

defensepotion.name: Defense Potion
defensepotion.desc: Defense +2 for the whole chapter when used.

devilaxe.name: Devil Axe
devilaxe.desc: A mighty but cursed axe known to harm its user.

reference.Other Effects:
Backfire rate: (21 - Luck/2)%
Backfire damage: Calculate damage as if user attacked themselves

devilsword.name: Devil Sword
devilsword.desc: A mighty but cursed sword known to harm its user.

reference.Other Effects:
Backfire rate: (21 - Luck/2)%
Backfire damage: Calculate damage as if user attacked themselves

divinestone.name: Divinestone
divinestone.desc:
Grants +10 Strength, +7 Skill, +4 Speed, +15 Defense, +11 Resistance.
A divine dragonstone effective against Manaketes.

doorkey.name: Door Key
doorkey.desc: A key used to open a door.

dracoshield.name: Dracoshield
dracoshield.desc: A shield that increases defense by 2.

reference.Other Effects: Does not deal effective damage against Dracoknights or Shadow Dragons.

draugslance.name: Draug's Lance
draugslance.desc: A lance owned by Draug, an Altean knight.

elfire.name: Elfire
elfire.desc: Potent magic used to attack with flames.

elixir.name: Elixir
elixir.desc: Medicine that completely restores HP when used.

elysianwhip.name: Elysian Whip
elysianwhip.desc: An item that promotes a pegasus knight at level 10 or above to falcoknight.

ember.name: Ember
ember.desc: A failed Fire tome with no use in combat.

energydrink.name: Energy Drink
energydrink.desc: Medicine that restores a lot of HP when used.

energydrop.name: Energy Drop
energydrop.desc: An item that increases strength by 2.

excalibur.name: Excalibur
excalibur.desc: Wind magic for men (Merric can use at level E).

falchion.name: Falchion
falchion.desc: A gift from the Divine Dragon King. For Marth.

reference.Other Effects:
Effective against Manakete and Earth Dragon units.
Can be used as an item to heal 10 HP.

fire.name: Fire
fire.desc: Magic used to attack with flames.

firebreath.name: Fire Breath
firebreath.desc: Flaming hot breath exhaled by dragons.

reference.Other Effects: Has a 1-2 range variant for Lunatic Mode and above.

fireemblem.name: Fire Emblem
fireemblem.desc: The conqueror's proof gifted from House Archanea. Its bearer is granted access to all treasure chests.

firestone.name: Firestone
firestone.desc:
Grants +8 Strength, +4 Skill, +4 Speed, +9 Defense, +4 Resistance.
A stone used to transform into a fire dragon.

fortify.name: Fortify
fortify.desc: A special staff used to restore HP to all allies.

fryingpan.name: Frying Pan
fryingpan.desc: A tool used for cooking, not fighting.

geosphere.name: Geosphere
geosphere.desc: Increases the critical rate of surrounding allies when held.

glass.name: Glass
glass.desc: Completely restores HP to a nearby ally. Fragile.

goddessicon.name: Goddess Icon
goddessicon.desc: A statue that increases luck by 2.

gordinsbow.name: Gordin's Bow
gordinsbow.desc: A bow owned by Gordin, an Altean knight.

gradivus.name: Gradivus
gradivus.desc: A mighty lance, and regalia of House Archanea.

reference.Other Effects: Can be used as an item to fully heal HP.

hammer.name: Hammer
hammer.desc: An axe weapon effective against armored units.

hammerne.name: Hammerne
hammerne.desc: Repairs an ally's combat item. For Lena or Marisha.

handaxe.name: Hand Axe
handaxe.desc: An axe used to attack foes directly or indirectly.

hauteclere.name: Hauteclere
hauteclere.desc: A formidable axe whose power is second to none.

reference.Other Effects: Can be used as an item to heal 10 HP.

heal.name: Heal
heal.desc: A staff used to restore HP to an adjacent ally.

hoistflamme.name: Hoistflamme
hoistflamme.desc: A ballista for striking distant enemies.

icebreath.name: Ice Breath
icebreath.desc: Freezing cold breath exhaled by dragons.

reference.Other Effects: Has a 1-2 range variant for Lunatic Mode and above.

icestone.name: Icestone
icestone.desc: Strength +5, skill +7, speed +4, defense +13, resistance +8. (Bonuses can't go over 30 Def/Res total.)

imhullu.name: Imhullu
imhullu.desc: Dark magic that nullifies all attacks on its bearer.

immortalaxe.name: Immortal Axe
immortalaxe.desc: An axe that restores HP when used.

reference.Other Effects: Can be used as an item to heal 20 HP.

iotesshield.name: Iote's Shield
iotesshield.desc: A shield that negates bonus damage to the flier who carries it.

ironaxe.name: Iron Axe
ironaxe.desc: An affordable axe that is easy to wield.

ironbow.name: Iron Bow
ironbow.desc: An affordable bow that is easy to wield.

ironlance.name: Iron Lance
ironlance.desc: An affordable lance that is easy to wield.

ironsword.name: Iron Sword
ironsword.desc: An affordable sword that is easy to wield.

javelin.name: Javelin
javelin.desc: A throwing spear used to attack enemies indirectly.

killeraxe.name: Killer Axe
killeraxe.desc: An axe whose design yields frequent critical hits.

killerbow.name: Killer Bow
killerbow.desc: A bow whose design yields frequent critical hits.

killerlance.name: Killer Lance
killerlance.desc: A lance whose design yields frequent critical hits.

killingedge.name: Killing Edge
killingedge.desc: A sword whose design yields frequent critical hits.

ladyblade.name: Ladyblade
ladyblade.desc: A mighty sword that only women can wield.

laundrypole.name: Laundry Pole
laundrypole.desc: A long pole meant for daily use, not for battle.

legionsaxe.name: Legion's Axe
legionsaxe.desc: An axe owned by Legion of the Assassins.

levinsword.name: Levin Sword
levinsword.desc: A lightning sword. Can be used to attack indirectly.

lifesphere.name: Lifesphere
lifesphere.desc: Restores 20 HP every turn when held.

lightsphere.name: Lightsphere
lightsphere.desc: Carrying it nullifies the enemy's terrain bonus during battle.

reference.Other Effects: Negates the effect of the Darksphere.

longbow.name: Longbow
longbow.desc: A bow with great range used to strike distant foes.

luckbond.name: Luck Bond
luckbond.desc: Luck +2 for the whole chapter when used.

luckpotion.name: Luck Potion
luckpotion.desc: Luck +2 for the whole chapter when used.

lukessword.name: Luke's Sword
lukessword.desc: A sword owned by Luke, an Altean knight.

reference.Other Effects:
Nullifies damage dealt by enemy magical attacks.
Has a 1-2 range variant for Lunatic Mode and above.

magestone.name: Magestone
magestone.desc:
Grants +7 Magic, +1 Skill, -1 Speed, +11 Defense, +10 Resistance.
A stone used to transform into a mage dragon.

reference.Other Effects: Nullifies damage dealt by enemy magical attacks.

magicbond.name: Magic Bond
magicbond.desc: Magic +2 for the whole chapter when used.

magicpotion.name: Magic Potion
magicpotion.desc: Magic +2 for the whole chapter when used.

masterkey.name: Master Key
masterkey.desc: A key effective on any locked door, chest, or bridge.

masterseal.name: Master Seal
masterseal.desc: An item that promotes a lesser-class unit at level 10 or above to a higher class.

mastersword.name: Master Sword
mastersword.desc: A powerful sword with a high critical rate.

maturitydrop.name: Maturity Drop
maturitydrop.desc: Permanently increases HP growth rate by 20% and all other growth rates by 10%.

mediocre.name: Mediocre
mediocre.desc: Heals ( Magic / 2 + 1 ) HP to one ally.

mend.name: Mend
mend.desc: Greatly restores HP to an adjacent ally.

mercurius.name: Mercurius
mercurius.desc: A powerful blade, and regalia of House Archanea.

merricstome.name: Merric's Tome
merricstome.desc: A tome owned by Merric, the wind mage of Khadein.

meteor.name: Meteor
meteor.desc: Powerful magic that can attack enemies from afar.

nosferatu.name: Nosferatu
nosferatu.desc: Powerful magic that drains enemy HP. For women.

obtusesword.name: Obtuse Sword
obtusesword.desc: A sword with a worn out edge, unfit for combat.

ogmasblade.name: Ogma's Blade
ogmasblade.desc: A sword owned by Ogma, mercenary of Talys.

pachyderm.name: Pachyderm
pachyderm.desc: A ballista for striking distant enemies.

parthia.name: Parthia
parthia.desc: A formidable bow, and regalia of House Archanea.

reference.Other Effects:
Grants +7 Resistance (effect lowers each turn).
Cannot be forged.

physic.name: Physic
physic.desc: A staff used to restore HP to a distant ally.

poleax.name: Poleax
poleax.desc: An axe weapon effective against cavalry.

puresword.name: Pure Sword
puresword.desc: A sword that boosts resistance. The effect lessens with each passing turn.

purewater.name: Pure Water
purewater.desc: Medicine that boosts resistance. The effect lessens with each passing turn.

quickaxe.name: Quick Axe
quickaxe.desc: An axe that's weak, but can attack twice in a row.

quickbow.name: Quick Bow
quickbow.desc: A bow that's weak, but can attack twice in a row.

quicklance.name: Quick Lance
quicklance.desc: A lance that's weak, but can attack twice in a row.

quicksword.name: Quick Sword
quicksword.desc: A sword that's weak, but can attack twice in a row.

rainbowpotion.name: Rainbow Potion
rainbowpotion.desc: A potion that raises all stats by 2 for the whole chapter when used.

rapier.name: Rapier
rapier.desc: Strong against cavalry/armored units. For Marth.

recover.name: Recover
recover.desc: Completely restores HP to an adjacent ally.

reesestome.name: Reese's Tome
reesestome.desc: A tome owned by Reese, who took the name Katarina.

rescue.name: Rescue
rescue.desc: Brings a ally next to the user.

resistancebond.name: Resistance Bond
resistancebond.desc: Resistance +2 for the whole chapter when used.

resistancepotion.name: Resistance Potion
resistancepotion.desc: Resistance +2 for the whole chapter when used.

roderickslance.name: Roderick's Lance
roderickslance.desc: A lance owned by Roderick, an Altean knight.

ryansbow.name: Ryan's Bow
ryansbow.desc: A bow owned by Ryan, an Altean knight.

secretbook.name: Secret Book
secretbook.desc: An item that increases skill by 2.

seraphrobe.name: Seraph Robe
seraphrobe.desc: A robe that increases maximum HP by 7.

silence.name: Silence
silence.desc: Prevents a enemy from using tomes/staves for 1 turn.

silveraxe.name: Silver Axe
silveraxe.desc: An axe whose mighty blows offset its steep price.

silverbow.name: Silver Bow
silverbow.desc: A bow whose might offsets its steep price.

silvercard.name: Silver Card
silvercard.desc: A card whose bearer can purchase weapons and items at half price.

reference.Other Effects: Cannot be used in preparations or on the Online Shop.

silverlance.name: Silver Lance
silverlance.desc: A lance whose mighty blow offset its steep price.

silversword.name: Silver Sword
silversword.desc: A sword whose mighty blows offset its steep price.

skillbond.name: Skill Bond
skillbond.desc: Increases skill by 2 for one chapter.

skillpotion.name: Skill Potion
skillpotion.desc: Increases skill by 2 for one chapter.

sleet.name: Sleet
sleet.desc: A failed Blizzard tome. Weak, but raises critical.

spear.name: Spear
spear.desc: A throwing spear that can also attack from afar.

speedbond.name: Speed Bond
speedbond.desc: Increases speed by 2 for one chapter.

speedpotion.name: Speed Potion
speedpotion.desc: Increases speed by 2 for one chapter.

speedstaff.name: Speed Staff
speedstaff.desc: A staff that raises an ally's Spd by 2 for 1 turn.

speedwings.name: Speedwings
speedwings.desc: A feather that increases speed by 2.

spiritdust.name: Spirit Dust
spiritdust.desc: An item that increases magic by 2.

starlight.name: Starlight
starlight.desc: The sole magic capable of thwarting Imhullu's power.

starsphere.name: Starsphere
starsphere.desc:
+2 Strength, +2 Magic, +2 Skill, +2 Speed, +2 Luck, +2 Defense, +2 Resistance.
Raises all stats by 2 when held.

steelaxe.name: Steel Axe
steelaxe.desc: A weighty but more powerful axe.

steelbow.name: Steel Bow
steelbow.desc: A weighty but more powerful bow.

steellance.name: Steel Lance
steellance.desc: A weighty but more powerful lance.

steelsword.name: Steel Sword
steelsword.desc: A weighty but more powerful sword.

stonehoist.name: Stonehoist
stonehoist.desc: A ballista for striking distant enemies.

strengthbond.name: Strength Bond
strengthbond.desc: Increases strength by 2 for one chapter.

strengthpotion.name: Strength Potion
strengthpotion.desc: Increases strength by 2 for one chapter.

strengthstaff.name: Strength Staff
strengthstaff.desc: A staff that raises an ally's Str by 2 for 1 turn.

swarm.name: Swarm
swarm.desc: Magic used to attack a distant enemy.

reference.Other Effects: Also Effective against Swordmasters and Heroes.

talisman.name: Talisman
talisman.desc: An item that increases resistance by 2.

thief.name: Thief
thief.desc: A staff that can open chests.

thoron.name: Thoron
thoron.desc: Superior magic used to attack with lightning.

thunder.name: Thunder
thunder.desc: Magic used to attack with lightning.

thunderbolt.name: Thunderbolt
thunderbolt.desc: A magical ballista strong against ballisticians.

tomahawk.name: Tomahawk
tomahawk.desc: A throwing axe that can also attack from afar.

toybow.name: Toy Bow
toybow.desc: A children's play toy, not meant for battle.

unlock.name: Unlock
unlock.desc: A staff that can open locked doors.

usedpotion.name: Used Potion
usedpotion.desc: A half-used potion that restores a little HP when used.

vipcard.name: VIP Card
vipcard.desc: A card that grants the bearer purchasing privileges at special shops.

warp.name: Warp
warp.desc: Transports an adjacent ally to another location.

wingspear.name: Wing Spear
wingspear.desc: Strong against cavalry/armored units. For Caeda.

wodao.name: Wo Dao
wodao.desc: An exotic sword that yields frequent critical hits.

wrysstaff.name: Wrys's Staff
wrysstaff.desc: A staff owned by Wrys, an Altean curate.

reference.Other Effects: Does not deal effective damage against Dracoknights or Shadow Dragons.

wyvernstone.name: Wyvernstone
wyvernstone.desc:
Grants +5 Strength, +4 Skill, +7 Speed, +8 Defense, +3 Resistance.
A stone used to transform into a wyvern.
